The dimensions of the prism are 2 units by 4 units by 6 units. Scale the sketch by 0.75 prior to extrusion. The operation to be used is "create a new solid body." After completing these steps, you will have created the base for your three-dimensional geometric shape, which has a flat base and a tapered top, resembling a pyramid or a hexagonal prism. The base measures 0.75 x 0.75 units, and its height is 0.2924 units.</description>
